@tool_tip.string: Check this to hear default sounds from collisions
Check this to hear sounds from gestures
Automatically unmute Ambient after teleporting, if muted (default: off)
Automatically unmute Sound Effects after teleporting, if muted (default: off)

#text.string: Play a sound when my friends:

@tool_tip.string: Plays a sound when money is spent or received higher then the amount set here.
This settings allows / disallows scripted prims from controlling your media connections

@label.string: Allow inworld scripts to play media

@tool_tip.string: Uncheck this to hide media attached to other avatars nearby

@label.string: Play media attached to other avatars

@tool_tip.string: Check this to enable the filter that allows you to choose whether to play media from a specific host
Minimum distance from the source for rolloff to begin taking effect.
Maximum distance from the source for rolloff to completely mute the sound.
Check this to automatically start audio streams.
Check this if fading should be used when the parcel audio stream changes
Audio fade in time for parcel audio.
Audio fade out time for parcel audio.

@label.string: Allow Voice in multiple viewer instances simultaneously

panel:Media Voice tab.#comment:
<text
         type="string"
         length="1"
         follows="left|top"
         layout="topleft"
         left="25"
         top_pad="5"
         name="Listen from"
         width="112">
            Listen from:
        </text>
        <icon
         follows="left|top"
         height="18"
         image_name="Cam_FreeCam_Off"
         layout="topleft"
         name="camera_icon"
         mouse_opaque="false"
         visible="true"
         width="18"
         left_pad="-4"
         top_delta="-5"/>
        <icon
         follows="left|top"
         height="18"
         image_name="Move_Walk_Off"
         layout="topleft"
         left_pad="170"
         name="avatar_icon"
         mouse_opaque="false"
         visible="true"
         width="18"
         top_delta="0" />

@label.string: Hear Nearby Voices at full volume (Open Sim Only)

@tool_tip.string: Shows Voice Indicator (white dot) over avatars

@label.string: Show voice visualizer over my own avatar
Show the dot as part of the voice visualizer

@tool_tip.string: If enabled, the dot is shown as part of the voice visualizer. If disabled, it only shows voice waves.
Shows Voice Indicator and move lips in world while being in private and group calls

@label.string: Show voice channel state in conversation tabs

@tool_tip.string: Shows the current voice channel state in the tabs in the conversations window

@label.string: Automatically reject all incoming group voice calls
Automatically reject all incoming conference (ad-hoc) voice calls
Automatically reject all incoming P2P (avatar with avatar) voice calls
Toggle speak on/off when I press button in toolbar

@tool_tip.string: When in toggle mode, press and release the trigger key ONCE to switch your microphone on or off. When not in toggle mode, the microphone broadcasts your voice only while the trigger is being held down.
Change the volume using this slider

#text.string:
Here you can change (by providing sound UUIDs), enable or disable default interface sounds.
Hover your mouse cursor over UUID field to show its default value.

@tool_tip.string: Sound UUID played on default Firestorm alerts.

Sound UUID played on mouse button release.
Sound UUID played, when female avatar takes damage.
Sound UUID played, when male avatar takes damage.

Sound UUID played on money balance increase.
Sound UUID played on incoming instant message. This setting is shared with Chat > Notifications > 'When receiving Instant Messages'.

@label.string: Play only if not in focus

@label.string: Play only if not in focus

@tool_tip.string: Sound UUID played on incoming conference instant message. This setting is shared with Chat > Notifications > 'When receiving ad-hoc Instant Messages'.

@label.string: Play only if not in focus

Sound UUID played on object deletion.

Sound UUID played on object derezzing.
Sound UUID played when taking snapshot. This setting is shared with 'Quiet Snapshots' option from Advanced menu.
Sound UUID played on teleporting. This setting is shared with Move and View > Movement > 'Play sound effect when teleporting'.
